page.title: 06Games 2
page.content: This is how we play{Queen Oceoceo. Sombody is on.They have a ball.They can throw the ball anywhere they like. But the person must have his back to the other children so that he can't see which one of the children has got the ball.The children say "Queen Oceoceo who's got the balleo I havent got it,it isn't between my legs see". Then the children open their legs.The person turns round and has to guess who's got the ball.If he says some ones got the ball and they havent another person is on.If he gets it right he is on again.He can say they are an empty dustbin,that means they haven't got the ball.He can say Kings Passing and go past the children.If sombody catches rhe ball he or she says Fish and Chips then the person who caught the ball is on.
